properties.name: spring.telegram.client.api-hash
properties.description: Application identifier hash for Telegram API access, which can be obtained at https://my.telegram.org

properties.name: spring.telegram.client.api-id
properties.description: Application identifier for Telegram API access, which can be obtained at https://my.telegram.org

properties.name: spring.telegram.client.phone
properties.description: The phone number of the user, in international format.

properties.name: spring.telegram.client.application-version
properties.description: Application version; must be non-empty.

properties.name: spring.telegram.client.database-directory
properties.description: The path to the directory for the persistent database; if empty, the current working directory will be used.

properties.name: spring.telegram.client.database-encryption-key
properties.description: Encryption key for the database. If the encryption key is invalid, then an error with code 401 will be returned.

properties.name: spring.telegram.client.device-model
properties.description: Model of the device the application is being run on; must be non-empty.

properties.name: spring.telegram.client.enable-storage-optimizer
properties.description: Pass true to automatically delete old files in background.

properties.name: spring.telegram.client.files-directory
properties.description: The path to the directory for storing files; if empty, databaseDirectory will be used.

properties.name: spring.telegram.client.ignore-file-names
properties.description: Pass true to ignore original file names for downloaded files. Otherwise, downloaded files are saved under names as close as possible to the original name.

properties.name: spring.telegram.client.system-language-code
properties.description: IETF language tag of the user's operating system language; must be non-empty.

properties.name: spring.telegram.client.system-version
properties.description: Version of the operating system the application is being run on. If empty, the version is automatically detected by TDLib.

properties.name: spring.telegram.client.use-chat-info-database
properties.description: Pass true to keep cache of users, basic groups, supergroups, channels and secret chats between restarts. Implies useFileDatabase.

properties.name: spring.telegram.client.use-file-database
properties.description: Pass true to keep information about downloaded and uploaded files between application restarts.

properties.name: spring.telegram.client.use-message-database
properties.description: Pass true to keep cache of chats and messages between restarts. Implies useChatInfoDatabase.

properties.name: spring.telegram.client.use-secret-chats
properties.description: Pass true to enable support for secret chats.

properties.name: spring.telegram.client.use-test-dc
properties.description: Pass true to use Telegram test environment instead of the production environment.

properties.name: spring.telegram.client.proxy.port
properties.description: Proxy port.

properties.name: spring.telegram.client.proxy.server
properties.description: Proxy server address.

properties.name: spring.telegram.client.proxy.http.http-only
properties.description: Pass true if the proxy supports only HTTP requests and doesn't support transparent TCP connections via HTTP CONNECT method.

properties.name: spring.telegram.client.proxy.http.password
properties.description: Http proxy password.

properties.name: spring.telegram.client.proxy.http.username
properties.description: Http proxy username.

properties.name: spring.telegram.client.proxy.mtproto.secret
properties.description: MtProto proxy secret.

properties.name: spring.telegram.client.proxy.socks5.password
properties.description: Socks5 proxy password.

properties.name: spring.telegram.client.proxy.socks5.username
properties.description: Socks5 proxy username.

properties.name: spring.telegram.client.log-verbosity-level
properties.description: The maximum verbosity level of messages for which the callback will be called.
